TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Rwanda, title = Rwanda, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Rwanda} }

S.FORM: Rwanda hya' ga cyux maki' tay 2 00 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syuw. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 26,338 sq km (maki' tay 149ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 24,668 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilung hya' ga 1,670 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' squliq hya' ga 12,988,423. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahun hya' ga 74.50% , lhlahuy hya' ga 18%, sni' naha' sa pptzyuwaw sa bzinah hya' ga 7.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' krahu' qalang hya' ga Kigali. snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlungan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpitu' byacing na qutux kawas. mrhuw Kokka' mrhuw Kokka' ta' misuw hya' ga Paul Kagame, aring ryax 22 squ byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2000 lga, musa' spazyang balay ms'rux kya la. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' CIA 外交部

Rwanda hya' ga cyox maki' tay 2 00 S, 30 00 E na Xweco syow. kwara' kinghciyan niya' 26,338 sq km (maki' tay 149ginkgan kin wahci') (kinwhci' niya' ga 24,668 sq km , kinwhci' na lawsayan wsilong hya' ga 1,670 sq km) Kinkhmayan kwara' sqoliq hya' ga 12,988,423. Pinbcyan naha' sni' naha' rhzyal hya' iy pqmahon hya' ga 74.50% , lhlahoy hya' ga 18%, sni' naha' sa pptzyowaw sa bzinah hya' ga 7.50%. spzyang qalang na Kokka' spzyang naha' kraho' qalang hya' ga Kigali. snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' snyan kinramat inlongan na Kokka' hya' ga 1 na tay mpito' byacing na qotox kawas. mrhow Kokka' mrhow Kokka' ta' misow hya' ga Paol Kagame, aring ryax 22 sqo byacing tay 4 sa kawas 2000 lga, mosa' spazyang balay ms'rox kya la. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' CIA 外交部
